description.raw:
The `<actor><pose>` tag was being ignored. In fact, it is also essentially ignored on Gazebo-classic.

This PR makes it so all poses within the actor's trajectory are calculated with respect to the actor's top-level pose. The actor's root pose initially comes from the SDF, and can be updated by other plugins at runtime (I can add a demo for this).

This is a breaking change for users who have been setting the `<pose>` value to an arbitrary value. It actually breaks @{557058:ad32c2b0-bebb-403e-b385-c3c1f7aa1d09} 's [actor](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/Mingfei/fuel/models/actor) which we've been using on the demo. That actor has a pose of 1 in Z, so now the actor performs its trajectory while floating 1 meter above ground.

Given the side-effect above, I'd be ok retargetting this change to Dome.
